means: 无信仰，不信， （尤指）不信上帝、宗教等

sentence.Network_en: Tom glanced around to see if we mirrored his unbelief.
sentence.Network_cn: 汤姆瞥了大家一眼,看看我们脸上是否也反映出他的怀疑.

sentence.Network_en: He slipped from the table, laughing softly in unbelief.
sentence.Network_cn: 他从桌子上滑下来, 微微一笑,表示不怎么相信她的话.

sentence.Network_en: John was staring as if in unbelief.
sentence.Network_cn: 约翰难以置信地瞪视着.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 是不信（unbelief）神的一种态度。没有信靠神和仰望从神而来的应许，是人取代了神的主权，喧宾夺主！
以杨过为例，其自负疏离、无信仰（unbelief）完全符合反英雄（antihero）的作风；虽然最后他变成书中的主流英雄，但神雕大侠的 …

list.abs: The most fearful unbelief is unbelief in your self ., 最可怕的不信任是不信任自己.
Do not let unbelief and bitterness grow inside us ., 不要让不信和苦毒在心中滋长.
The unbelief of God is our principle ., 不信仰上帝是我们的原则.
...个时代结束到第七个时代之间是七年的战争与灾难，即“大灾难”时期。正是在这个短暂大灾难阶段，犹太人将“不信地”（in unbelief）回归应许之地并建立起国家，并有十四万四千人受印接受基督为拯救者；这个国家将受敌基督的统治，犹太人将遭.

auth_sentence.content: I had received the news with contemptuous unbelief.
auth_sentence.res_content: I had received the news with contemptuous unbelief.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I had received the news with contemptuous unbelief.

auth_sentence.content: It must be said that your unbelief does not constitute a rational critique.
auth_sentence.res_content: It must be said that your unbelief does not constitute a rational critique.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It must be said that your unbelief does not constitute a rational critique.

auth_sentence.content: They come from a particular angle that of determined unbelief which dilutes their impact.
